kizuna_ecology_c_02:
I see you’ve already registered 100 species of
Pokémon to your Pokédex for me![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_c_03:
Wow! Little Pokémon! Big Pokémon! Whoa, you
even have data on Pokémon of this specific size?!\r
So much data! SO MUCH TO ANALYZE![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_c_04: Ah...sorry about that. I got a little excited there.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_c_05:
My Pokémon research is moving forward at a
great pace thanks to your efforts.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_c_06:
Here, take these. Consider it my way of saying
thanks.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_c_07:
You’re a natural at this Pokémon catching thing,
aren’t you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_c_08: For your next goal, let’s aim for 200 species![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_ecology_c_09:
I know that’s a tall order, but keep tossing those
Poké Balls and don’t give up![VAR 0114(002A)]
